Key Match Events: Ferran Torres scored the only goal of the match in the 13th minute
Pre-Game Insights: Albania's coach, Sylvinho, had stated that even Spain's B team could play the final and still be favorites
Post-Match Reflections: Albania's coach, Sylvinho, expressed pride in his team's performance and the experience gained
Miscellaneous Highlights: Albania is the most international team at Euro 2024, with players from eight leagues
Others: Albania's fans created a sea of red dotted with white qeleshes and clapped together after the match
